import React, {useRef} from 'react' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {Container, Typography} from '@material-ui/core' import {CarIcon} from '../../../elements/icons' import {SliderArrow} from "../../../elements/slider_arrow/SliderArrow" import {useStyles} from './useStyles' export const CategorySlider = () => { const slider = useRef(); const next = () => { slider.current.slickNext() } const previous = () => { slider.current.slickPrev() } const classes = useStyles(); const settings = { dots: false, infinite: false, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, adaptiveHeight: true, autoplay: false, centerMode: false, arrows: false, } return (
